article_text: Is there another federal government shutdown in our immediate future? That’s how it’s shaping up, if irresponsible members of Congress have their way when the nation’s elected representatives return to Capitol Hill this week after the summer recess.

article_metadata.title: No to another government shutdown | Miami Herald
